title: Good Faith Error or Deliberate Gaming of the Patent System? Qvist and Elitewheels Have Somehow Ended Up with the Same Hub Design
content:
In a complicated international patent case, Qvist and Elitewheels have pending and approved patents in different countries for the same hub design.

Read the full article at Good Faith Error or Deliberate Gaming of the Patent System? Qvist and Elitewheels Have Somehow Ended Up with the Same Hub Design on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
